channel.title: Homes on Madhu Akula
channel.description: Recent content in Homes on Madhu Akula

item.description: Madhu Akula is a security ninja, security and devops researcher with extensive experience in the industry ranging from client facing assignments building scalable and secure infrastructure, to publishing industry leading research to running training sessions for companies and governments alike. Madhuâ€™s frequently speaks and runs technical sessions at security events and conferences around the world including Defcon (26, 24), Blackhat USA 2018, USENIX LISA 2018, Appsec EU 2018, All Day DevOps (2018, 2017, 2016), DevSecCon (London, Singapore, Boston), DevOpsDays India, c0c0n(2018, 2017), Serverless Summit ToorCon, DefCamp, SkydogCon, NolaCon and null, etc.

item.title: Trainings
item.description: I deliver trainings on following courses Automated Defence for AWS, Azure and GCP Container Security Modern Security Operations aka Secure DevOps Cloud Security for AWS, Azure and GCP Web Application Security Testing
